---
name: New TAG request
about: Creation of a new tag
labels: new-tag
assignees: 'faustinolr, pablosfe'
---
### Fill the template below with the new Tag information

    "name": 
    "description":
    "type": 
    "example":

### Example
    "name":  "project_Id",
    "description": "Id that identifies the project",
    "type": "String",
    "example": "CDARKSPA"

### More information
- [Tags Documentation](https://data-observability-tag.docs.inditex.dev/)
